languages.text: {n}Вы пытаетесь перехватить ножницы, но нападающий оказывается быстрее. Вам приходится подставить себя, чтобы спасти жертву. Удар портняжными ножницами, к счастью, оказывается не смертельным, а спасенный дворянин быстро прячется у вас за спиной.{/n}

{n}You try to grab the scissors, but the attacker is faster. You have to put yourself in harm's way to save the victim. Fortunately, the wound from the tailor's scissors is not fatal, and the rescued nobleman quickly hides behind your back.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь перехватить ножницы, но нападающий оказывается быстрее. Вам приходится подставить себя, чтобы спасти жертву. Удар портняжными ножницами, к счастью, оказывается не смертельным, а спасенный дворянин быстро прячется у вас за спиной.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You try to grab the scissors, but the attacker is faster. You have to put yourself in harm's way to save the victim. Fortunately, the wound from the tailor's scissors is not fatal, and the rescued nobleman quickly hides behind your back.{/n}

{n}You try to grab the scissors, but the attacker is faster. You have to put yourself in harm's way to save the victim. Fortunately, the wound from the tailor's scissors is not fatal, and the rescued nobleman quickly hides behind your back.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试图夺过剪刀，但袭击者的动作更快，于是你不得不冒着生命危险，救出了受害者。好消息是，裁缝剪刺出的伤口并不致命，被你救下的贵族迅速躲到了你身后。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to grab the scissors, but the attacker is faster. You have to put yourself in harm's way to save the victim. Fortunately, the wound from the tailor's scissors is not fatal, and the rescued nobleman quickly hides behind your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试图夺过剪刀，但袭击者的动作更快，于是你不得不冒着生命危险，救出了受害者。好消息是，裁缝剪刺出的伤口并不致命，被你救下的贵族迅速躲到了你身后。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハサミを掴もうとするが、襲撃者の方が一瞬早かった。被害者を救うため、危険を顧みず身を投じなければならなかった。幸い、仕立屋のハサミによる傷は致命傷ではなく、救い出された貴族はすぐにあなたの背後に身を隠した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to grab the scissors, but the attacker is faster. You have to put yourself in harm's way to save the victim. Fortunately, the wound from the tailor's scissors is not fatal, and the rescued nobleman quickly hides behind your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハサミを掴もうとするが、襲撃者の方が一瞬早かった。被害者を救うため、危険を顧みず身を投じなければならなかった。幸い、仕立屋のハサミによる傷は致命傷ではなく、救い出された貴族はすぐにあなたの背後に身を隠した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas agarrar las tijeras, pero el agresor es más rápido que tú y te ves {mf|obligado|obligada} a interponerte entre él y la víctima para salvarla. Por suerte la herida causada por las tijeras del sastre no es mortal, y el noble rescatado corre a parapetarse detrás de ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to grab the scissors, but the attacker is faster. You have to put yourself in harm's way to save the victim. Fortunately, the wound from the tailor's scissors is not fatal, and the rescued nobleman quickly hides behind your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas agarrar las tijeras, pero el agresor es más rápido que tú y te ves {mf|obligado|obligada} a interponerte entre él y la víctima para salvarla. Por suerte la herida causada por las tijeras del sastre no es mortal, y el noble rescatado corre a parapetarse detrás de ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Makası elinden almaya davransan da saldırgan hızlı çıkıyor. Kurbanı kurtarmak için kendini tehlikeye atman gerekiyor. Neyse ki terzi makası, adamı hafifçe yaralıyor. Adamın elinden kurtulan soylu da anında arkana saklanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to grab the scissors, but the attacker is faster. You have to put yourself in harm's way to save the victim. Fortunately, the wound from the tailor's scissors is not fatal, and the rescued nobleman quickly hides behind your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Makası elinden almaya davransan da saldırgan hızlı çıkıyor. Kurbanı kurtarmak için kendini tehlikeye atman gerekiyor. Neyse ki terzi makası, adamı hafifçe yaralıyor. Adamın elinden kurtulan soylu da anında arkana saklanıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous tentez de saisir les ciseaux, mais l'assaillant se montre plus rapide que vous. Vous n'avez d'autre choix que de vous mettre en danger pour sauver la victime. Fort heureusement, la blessure des ciseaux du tailleur n'est pas mortelle, et le noble secouru se réfugie rapidement dans votre dos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to grab the scissors, but the attacker is faster. You have to put yourself in harm's way to save the victim. Fortunately, the wound from the tailor's scissors is not fatal, and the rescued nobleman quickly hides behind your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tentez de saisir les ciseaux, mais l'assaillant se montre plus rapide que vous. Vous n'avez d'autre choix que de vous mettre en danger pour sauver la victime. Fort heureusement, la blessure des ciseaux du tailleur n'est pas mortelle, et le noble secouru se réfugie rapidement dans votre dos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst, dem Angreifer die Schere zu entwinden, doch der ist schneller. Du musst dich selbst in Gefahr begeben, um das Opfer zu retten. Zum Glück ist die Wunde durch die Schere des Schneiders nicht tödlich, und der gerettete Adelige versteckt sich rasch hinter dir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to grab the scissors, but the attacker is faster. You have to put yourself in harm's way to save the victim. Fortunately, the wound from the tailor's scissors is not fatal, and the rescued nobleman quickly hides behind your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du versuchst, dem Angreifer die Schere zu entwinden, doch der ist schneller. Du musst dich selbst in Gefahr begeben, um das Opfer zu retten. Zum Glück ist die Wunde durch die Schere des Schneiders nicht tödlich, und der gerettete Adelige versteckt sich rasch hinter dir.{/n}
